meanings.definition: A person who is undergoing pain or distress.
meanings.sent1: The sufferers in the hospital received care from the nurses.
meanings.sent2: The support group provided comfort to the sufferers.
meanings.sent3: The little dog tried to cheer up the sufferers with its wagging tail.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds seemed to mirror the feelings of the sufferers.
meanings.sent5: The cries of the sufferers echoed through the night.

meanings.definition: Those who are experiencing hardship or difficulty.
meanings.sent1: The sufferers of the drought were in need of water.
meanings.sent2: The community came together to help the sufferers of the flood.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show brought laughter to the sufferers of boredom.
meanings.sent4: The mountain climbers were the true sufferers of the harsh weather.
meanings.sent5: The determined look in the eyes of the sufferers showed their resilience.
